alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:44AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph today. Winds increasing to 20 to 40 mph with gusts of 40 to 60 mph tonight, strongest gusts along the desert mountain slopes where localized gusts to 80 mph is expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...Strongest winds expected between sunset this evening through sunrise Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust and sand could lead to sharp restrictions in visibility over the desert.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
